trans-unit.source: Create a virtual network using the Azure portal | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Create a virtual network using the Azure portal | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create a virtual network using the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create a virtual network using the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: Create a virtual network (classic) by using the Azure portal
trans-unit.target: Create a virtual network (classic) by using the Azure portal

trans-unit.source: This document covers creating a VNet by using the classic deployment model.
trans-unit.target: This document covers creating a VNet by using the classic deployment model.

trans-unit.source: You can also [create a virtual network in the Resource Manager deployment model by using the Azure preview portal](virtual-networks-create-vnet-arm-pportal.md).
trans-unit.target: You can also [create a virtual network in the Resource Manager deployment model by using the Azure preview portal](virtual-networks-create-vnet-arm-pportal.md).

trans-unit.source: You will learn to create a VNet from the Azure portal by using the UI, and by deploying a netcfg file.
trans-unit.target: You will learn to create a VNet from the Azure portal by using the UI, and by deploying a netcfg file.
